properties.title: Stolen 2016 Trek 7.2 FX (09-02-2018)
properties.description: Bike was hanging in our garage. I had just finished fixing a car, and got back from a test drive when it was smoking a bit from residual oil burning off and I left the garage door open while I went inside to put our kid to bed. Came out a half hour later and it was gone, along with 2 other bikes. This happened during a popular annual local fireworks display, and other bikes were stolen nearby. One of ours was found the next morning (it had flat tires, so they didn't get far), but the Trek and my wife's Schwinn Southport (pink and white) are still missing. Will add police report number when I get a chance. View details

properties.title: Sidewalk/Path (08-26-2018)
properties.description: The over grown brush near the eastern corner of Bruce and Park is is creating a hazard for patrons walking along this path to work and school. The other day my son was hit in the face by a bush as he attempted to ride his bike to school. The property is currently vacant. The bushes haven't been trimmed in several years. View details

properties.title: Property Maintenance (08-26-2018)
properties.description: The trees/bushes belonging to this property are overgrown and have become a hazard to children walking and riding their bikes to school and adults walking to the train. This week my child was hit in the face by a branch hanging from a tree. The house is vacant and isn't being well kept by the owners. The trees in question are at the intersection of Park and Bruce in Old Flossmoor along the east side of street at Bruce ave. View details

properties.title: Code Violation (08-26-2018)
properties.description: Once again the guy at 6526 Ohio ave is purposely placing his yard waste branches & twigs directly in front of our alley way! knowing we ride the bike down the alley so he's intentionally trying to hurt us. this is the fourth time that I reported him and nothing has been done View details

properties.title: Grass/Turf Damage (08-26-2018)
properties.description: Hello, Recently our sidewalk was replaced. The contractors removed the rigging for the cement but left the sides of the new walk without any dirt filler. Are they going to fill these gaps with dirt? I am afraid there could be a child riding their bikes on the sidewalk that could potentially cause an accident should their bike tire rail into the gap. Regards, JS Crespo View details

properties.title: Stolen 2014 Cannondale Quick 4 (08-16-2018)
properties.description: I last rode my bike Wednesday, August 8th, and chained it to my condo's metal patio fence using my $117 Bordo Heavy Duty Combo 6100 Folding Lock. When I went to my car yesterday I noticed my bike was missing. Someone jumped our condos backyard fence, somehow unlocked my lock, and stole my bike View details

properties.title: Stolen 2010 Giant Trance X1 (08-15-2018)
properties.description: It was inside of my locked storage locker, which is inside of my apartment building garage. The storage lockers are like cages, and have about a 12 inch gap of space at the top between the ceiling. The thief must have climbed over, taken the bike apart, lifted it over, climbed back out, and took it. I had used it 6 weeks ago, and I don't go into my locker often, so it was unnoticed until tonight. View details

properties.title: Other (08-15-2018)
